# Downloading Files from a Conversation

Learn how to download files generated by agents during your conversation.

## Overview

Some agents can generate files as part of their responses, such as:
- Generated reports
- Code files
- Data exports
- Images created by image generation tools

## Downloading Generated Files

1. When an agent generates a file, it will appear in the conversation
2. Look for download links or file icons
3. Click to download the file to your device

## File Types

Agents may generate:
- **Text files**: Reports, summaries, code
- **Data files**: CSV, JSON exports
- **Images**: Generated by DALL-E or similar tools
- **Documents**: Formatted output

- [Uploading Files to a Conversation](uploading-files.md)
- [Using the Code Interpreter Tool](using-code-interpreter.md)
